2022-07-21 11:22:12.721 +00:00 [ERR] The expression '(w.WrittenMangas == [Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.QueryRootExpression].Where(a => (a.Author == w.Name)))' is invalid inside an 'Include' operation, since it does not represent a property access: 't => t.MyProperty'. To target navigations declared on derived types, use casting ('t => ((Derived)t).MyProperty') or the 'as' operator ('t => (t as Derived).MyProperty'). Collection navigation access can be filtered by composing Where, OrderBy(Descending), ThenBy(Descending), Skip or Take operations. For more information on including related data, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=746393.
System.InvalidOperationException: The expression '(w.WrittenMangas == [Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.QueryRootExpression].Where(a => (a.Author == w.Name)))' is invalid inside an 'Include' operation, since it does not represent a property access: 't => t.MyProperty'. To target navigations declared on derived types, use casting ('t => ((Derived)t).MyProperty') or the 'as' operator ('t => (t as Derived).MyProperty'). Collection navigation access can be filtered by composing Where, OrderBy(Descending), ThenBy(Descending), Skip or Take operations. For more information on including related data, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=746393.
